mapper.sql: id, code, channel, model_name, language, version, description, content, variables, enabled, created_at, updated_at
mapper.select: SELECT FROM prompt_templates WHERE code = #{code} AND enabled = 1 ORDER BY version DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT FROM prompt_templates WHERE enabled = 1 ORDER BY code ASC, version DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prompt_templates (code, channel, model_name, language, version, description, content, variables, enabled, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{code}, #{channel}, #{modelName}, #{language}, #{version}, #{description}, #{content}, #{variables}, #{enabled}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE prompt_templates SET channel = #{channel}, model_name = #{modelName}, language = #{language}, version = #{version}, description = #{description}, content = #{content}, variables = #{variables}, enabled = #{enabled}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
